info.name: @CommaFeed: tweaks & fixups
info.description: Fixups and tweaks for CommaFeed (RSS Feed Reader). Will add more css rules as needed.
info.additionalInfo: versions: 1.00: link coloring and visitation; transitional highlighting when hovering select links; styling read article bars (kinda). 1.01: highlight up/down buttons. 1.02: color adjust to match site color (background-color for read articles). 1.03: highlight current selected tree item 1.04: removed style due to implementation by site (styling of read articles). 1.05: hover style Also: userstyle for InoReader
